title: Unavenged
description: Seventeen-year-old Aden Mather and his sister Fawn have been on the run from the city Mayor since their parents were executed for keeping their abilities a secret. It's been six years and Aden and Fawn are returning to their beloved city to seek vengeance for their parents demise. Will they succeed? Or will their entire world come crashing down upon them? In a world where having an un-human ability means public execution, one boy will take a stand against it all and fight for his life and the lives of others like him.
author: Richard P. Denney
